<<<<<<< HEAD
The dutiful advice of a loving sonne, to his aged father Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.
[2], 15 p.
Printed by W.B. and are to sold by W. Sheares ..., London : 1650.
Wrongly attributed to Sir Walter Raleigh, this item is an excerpt from Robert Southwell's "An epistle of a religious priest unto his father," first published in "A short rule of a good life." Also found following Maxims of state at reel 773:37. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library. Entry for R160 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.) No separate number assigned.
=======
The dutiful advice of a loving sonne, to his aged father Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.
[2], 15 p.
Printed by W.B. and are to sold by W. Sheares ..., London : 1650.
Wrongly attributed to Sir Walter Raleigh, this item is an excerpt from Robert Southwell's "An epistle of a religious priest unto his father," first published in "A short rule of a good life." Also found following Maxims of state at reel 773:37. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library. Entry for R160 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.) No separate number assigned.
W. Sheares
W.B.
